description: As an upper right triangle, number of distinct partitions of n where the highest part is k (0<=k<=n).
formula: T(n, k) =sum_j[T(n-k, j)] for k>j with T(0, 0)=1
mathematica: t[n_?Positive, k_] := t[n, k] = Sum[t[n-k, j], {j, 0, k-1}]; t[0, 0] = 1; t[0, _] = 0; t[_?Negative, _] = 0; Table[ t[n, k], {n, 0, 13}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 11 2012 *)
